item.title: That one time I was surfing Sunset on a perfect right and a stand up paddler decided to drop in on me and go left. Clearly there was no left.
item.description: That one time I was surfing Sunset on a perfect right and a stand up paddler decided to drop in on me and go left. Clearly there was no left.

item.title: Had such a rad time at #epicurrence! It's sad to finally be packing up and heading home but I'm so thankful to be able to have so many great conversations with so many talented and humble people. Huge thanks to @dannpetty, @vivintsolar, @billabong, @ride
item.description:
Had such a rad time at #epicurrence! It's sad to finally be packing up and heading home but I'm so thankful to be able to have so many great conversations with so many talented and humble people. Huge thanks to @dannpetty, @vivintsolar, @billabong, @ride

Had such a rad time at #epicurrence! It's sad to finally be packing up and heading home but I'm so thankful to be able to have so many great conversations with so many talented and humble people. Huge thanks to @dannpetty, @vivintsolar, @billabong, @rideononewheel, @sambazon, Ueno, @jaredfitch, @jbsamba, @unsplash, @ricocast, and everyone else who helped make this possible! This was truly the best design conference I have ever been to.

item.title: This guy @dannpetty threw the most awesomest event I've ever been to. #goepic #epicurrence
item.description: This guy @dannpetty threw the most awesomest event I've ever been to. #goepic #epicurrence

item.title: Chatting about feminism and diversity last night. Uncomfortable conversations are a positive thing. #epicurrence
item.description: Chatting about feminism and diversity last night. Uncomfortable conversations are a positive thing. #epicurrence

item.title: Don't mess with the locals in Hawaii. Getting punched out by @photomurray while @panchosullivan_hi looks on in disbelief.
item.description: Don't mess with the locals in Hawaii. Getting punched out by @photomurray while @panchosullivan_hi looks on in disbelief.

item.title: Goodbye Hawaii / @epicurrence until the next one! So stoked to have the opportunity to meet so many insanely talented design and tech leaders who I can now call friends. @dannpetty none of this would of been possible without you dude. @jonezell @gteehan
item.description:
Goodbye Hawaii / @epicurrence until the next one! So stoked to have the opportunity to meet so many insanely talented design and tech leaders who I can now call friends. @dannpetty none of this would of been possible without you dude. @jonezell @gteehan

Goodbye Hawaii / @epicurrence until the next one! So stoked to have the opportunity to meet so many insanely talented design and tech leaders who I can now call friends. @dannpetty none of this would of been possible without you dude. @jonezell @gteehan @dburka @mikeindustries @iansilber @tobygrubb @imjackdusty @gene.ross @alagoon @bgalmar @ricocast @austinhendrix @cor.by @juanarreguin and I know I'm missing so many more. #epicurrence

item.title: Rover Pack Rucksack Backpack | Topo Designs - Made in Colorado, USA
item.description:
Rover Pack Rucksack Backpack | Topo Designs - Made in Colorado, USA

Not too big, not too small, not too fancy, not too simple, our Rover Pack is the Goldilocks of rucksacks. 1000d Cordura. Made in Colorado, USA.
